render.description: Custom function to render the toast element.

duration.description: The duration the toast will be visible

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

gutter.description: The gutter or spacing between toasts

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

max.description: The maximum number of toasts that can be shown at once

offsets.description: The offset from the safe environment edge of the viewport

pauseOnInteraction.description: Whether to pause the toast when interacted with

pauseOnPageIdle.description: Whether to pause toast when the user leaves the browser tab

removeDelay.description:
The duration for the toast to kept alive before it is removed.
Useful for exit transitions.

zIndex.description: The z-index applied to each toast group
